fields.description: The unique identifier for the quote change reason.
A flag when set to true, deletes the quote change reason.
The reference to a change reason. It's a required value.
When the quote change reason is inactive, set the flag to true.
This is a read-only field. True if quote change reason is in use
Flag indicating if the inactive quote change reasons are to be included

Change_Reason.description: The reference to a change reason. It's a required value.

Delete.description: A flag when set to true, deletes the quote change reason.

In_Use.description: This is a read-only field. True if quote change reason is in use

Inactive.description: When the quote change reason is inactive, set the flag to true.

Include_Inactive_Quote_Change_Reasons_Pr.description: Flag indicating if the inactive quote change reasons are to be included

Quote_Change_Reason_ID.description: The unique identifier for the quote change reason.
